   20: 
   21: -module(trace_session_SUITE).
   22: 
   23: -export([all/0, suite/0]).
   24: 
   25: -export([test_set_on_spawn/1,
   26:          test_set_on_first_spawn/1,
   27:          test_set_on_link/1,
   28:          test_set_on_first_link/1,
   29:          on_load/1,
   30:          trace_info_on_load/1,
   31:          procs/1,
   32:          basic/1,
   33:          call/1,
   34:          meta/1,
   35:          end_of_list/1]).
   36: 
   37: -include_lib("common_test/include/ct.hrl").
   38: 
   39: 
   40: -undef(line).
   41: -ifdef(debug).
   42: -define(line,io:format("line ~p\n",[?LINE]),erlang:display(?LINE)).
   43: -else.
   44: -define(line,void).
   45: -endif.
   46: 
   47: -export([foo/0]).
   48: 
   49: suite() ->
   50:     [{ct_hooks,[ts_install_cth]},
   51:      {timetrap, {minutes, 1}}].
   52: 
   53: all() ->
   54:     [
   55:      basic,
   56:      call,
   57:      meta,
   58:      on_load,
   59:      trace_info_on_load,
   60:      procs,
   61:      test_set_on_spawn,
   62:      test_set_on_first_spawn,
   63:      test_set_on_link,
   64:      test_set_on_first_link,
   65:      end_of_list].
   66: on_load(_Config) ->
   67:     Tester= self(),
   68:     Tracer0 = spawn_link(fun() -> tracer("Tracer0", Tester) end),
   69:     Tracer1 = spawn_link(fun() -> tracer("Tracer1", Tester) end),
   70:     Tracer2 = spawn_link(fun() -> tracer("Tracer2", Tester) end),
   71:     S0 = erlang:trace_session_create([]),
   72:     S1 = erlang:trace_session_create([{tracer,Tracer1}]),
   73:     S2 = erlang:trace_session_create([{tracer,Tracer2}]),
   74:     on_load1(Tracer1, [{session, S1}]),
   75:     on_load2(Tracer1, [{session,S1}],
   76:             Tracer2, [{session,S2}]),
   77:     on_load2(Tracer0, [{tracer,Tracer0}],
   78:             Tracer2, [{session,S2}]),
   79:     on_load2(Tracer2, [{session,S2}],
   80:             Tracer0, [{tracer,Tracer0}]),
   81: 
   82:     on_load2(Tracer1, [{session,S1}],
   83:             Tracer0, [{tracer,Tracer0},{session,S0}]),
   84:     on_load2(Tracer0, [{tracer,Tracer0},{session,S0}],
   85:             Tracer1, [{session,S1}]),
   86: 
   87:     ok.
   88: trace_info_on_load(_Config) ->
   89:     Tester = self(),
   90:     Tracer = spawn_link(fun() -> tracer("Tracer", Tester) end),
   91:     S = erlang:trace_session_create([{tracer,Tracer}]),
   92:     1 = erlang:trace(self(), true, [call,{session,S}]),
   93:     0 = erlang:trace_pattern(on_load, true, [{session,S}]),
   94:     {all,[{traced,global},
   95:       {match_spec,[]},
   96:       {meta,false},
   97:       {meta_match_spec,false},
   98:       {call_count,false}]} = erlang:trace_info(S, on_load, all),
   99:     ok.
  100: on_load1(Tracer, Opts) ->
  101:     Tracee = self(),
  102:     1 = erlang:trace(self(), true, [call|Opts]),
  103:     Opts1 = proplists:delete(tracer, Opts),
  104:     0 = erlang:trace_pattern(on_load, true, Opts1),
  105:     ssh_agent:module_info(),
  106:     erlang:delete_module(ssh_agent),
  107:     erlang:purge_module(ssh_agent),
  108:     ?line,
  109:     {Tracer, {trace,Tracee,call,{ssh_agent,module_info,[]}}} = receive_any(),
  110:     1 = erlang:trace(self(), false, [call|Opts]),
  111:     ssh_agent:module_info(),
  112:     erlang:delete_module(ssh_agent),
  113:     erlang:purge_module(ssh_agent),
  114:     ?line,
  115:     timeout =  receive_any(),
  116:     0 = erlang:trace_pattern(on_load, false, Opts1),
  117:     ok.
  118: on_load2(Tracer1, Opts1, Tracer2, Opts2) ->
  119:     Tracee = self(),
  120:     1 = erlang:trace(self(), true, [call|Opts1]),
  121:     1 = erlang:trace(self(), true, [call|Opts2]),
  122:     Opts1_1 = proplists:delete(tracer, Opts1),
  123:     Opts2_1 = proplists:delete(tracer, Opts2),
  124:     0 = erlang:trace_pattern(on_load, true, Opts1_1),
  125:     0 = erlang:trace_pattern(on_load, true, Opts2_1),
  126:     ssh_agent:module_info(),
  127:     erlang:delete_module(ssh_agent),
  128:     erlang:purge_module(ssh_agent),
  129:     timer:sleep(100),
  130:     ?line,
  131:     receive_unsorted(
  132:         [{Tracer1,{trace,Tracee,call,{ssh_agent,module_info,[]}}},
  133:          {Tracer2,{trace,Tracee,call,{ssh_agent,module_info,[]}}}]),
  134:     1 = erlang:trace(self(), false, [call|Opts1]),
  135:     ssh_agent:module_info(),
  136:     erlang:delete_module(ssh_agent),
  137:     erlang:purge_module(ssh_agent),
  138:     ?line,
  139:     {Tracer2, {trace,Tracee,call,{ssh_agent,module_info,[]}}} = receive_any(),
  140:     1 = erlang:trace(self(), false, [call|Opts2]),
  141:     ssh_agent:module_info(),
  142:     erlang:delete_module(ssh_agent),
  143:     erlang:purge_module(ssh_agent),
  144:     ?line,
  145:     timeout =  receive_any(),
  146: 
  147:     0 = erlang:trace_pattern(on_load, false, Opts1_1),
  148:     0 = erlang:trace_pattern(on_load, false, Opts2_1),
  149:     ok.
  150: 
  151: test_set_on_spawn(_Config) ->
  152:     Tester= self(),
  153:     Tracer0 = spawn_link(fun() -> tracer("Tracer0", Tester) end),
  154:     Tracer1 = spawn_link(fun() -> tracer("Tracer1", Tester) end),
  155:     Tracer2 = spawn_link(fun() -> tracer("Tracer2", Tester) end),
  156:     S0 = erlang:trace_session_create([]),
  157:     S1 = erlang:trace_session_create([{tracer,Tracer1}]),
  158:     S2 = erlang:trace_session_create([{tracer,Tracer2}]),
  159: 
  160:     set_on_spawn(Tracer1, [{session, S1}]),
  161:     set_on_spawn2(Tracer1, [{session,S1}],
  162:             Tracer2, [{session,S2}]),
  163:     set_on_spawn2(Tracer0, [{tracer,Tracer0}],
  164:             Tracer2, [{session,S2}]),
  165:     set_on_spawn2(Tracer2, [{session,S2}],
  166:             Tracer0, [{tracer,Tracer0}]),
  167: 
  168:     set_on_spawn2(Tracer1, [{session,S1}],
  169:             Tracer0, [{tracer,Tracer0},{session,S0}]),
  170:     set_on_spawn2(Tracer0, [{tracer,Tracer0},{session,S0}],
  171:             Tracer1, [{session,S1}]),
  172: 
  173:     ok = erlang:trace_session_destroy(S0),
  174:     ok = erlang:trace_session_destroy(S1),
  175:     ok = erlang:trace_session_destroy(S2),
  176: 
  177:     unlink(Tracer0),
  178:     exit(Tracer0, die),
  179:     unlink(Tracer1),
  180:     exit(Tracer1, die),
  181:     unlink(Tracer2),
  182:     exit(Tracer2, die),
  183:     ok.
  184: test_set_on_first_spawn(_Config) ->
  185:     Tester= self(),
  186:     Tracer0 = spawn_link(fun() -> tracer("Tracer0", Tester) end),
  187:     Tracer1 = spawn_link(fun() -> tracer("Tracer1", Tester) end),
  188:     Tracer2 = spawn_link(fun() -> tracer("Tracer2", Tester) end),
  189:     S0 = erlang:trace_session_create([]),
  190:     S1 = erlang:trace_session_create([{tracer,Tracer1}]),
  191:     S2 = erlang:trace_session_create([{tracer,Tracer2}]),
  192: 
  193:     set_on_first_spawn(Tracer1, [{session, S1}]),
  194:     set_on_first_spawn2(Tracer1, [{session,S1}],
  195:             Tracer2, [{session,S2}]),
  196:     set_on_first_spawn2(Tracer0, [{tracer,Tracer0}],
  197:             Tracer2, [{session,S2}]),
  198:     set_on_first_spawn2(Tracer2, [{session,S2}],
  199:             Tracer0, [{tracer,Tracer0}]),
  200: 
  201:     set_on_first_spawn2(Tracer1, [{session,S1}],
  202:             Tracer0, [{tracer,Tracer0},{session,S0}]),
  203:     set_on_first_spawn2(Tracer0, [{tracer,Tracer0},{session,S0}],
  204:             Tracer1, [{session,S1}]),
  205: 
  206:     ok = erlang:trace_session_destroy(S0),
  207:     ok = erlang:trace_session_destroy(S1),
  208:     ok = erlang:trace_session_destroy(S2),
  209: 
  210:     unlink(Tracer0),
  211:     exit(Tracer0, die),
  212:     unlink(Tracer1),
  213:     exit(Tracer1, die),
  214:     unlink(Tracer2),
  215:     exit(Tracer2, die),
  216:     ok.
  217: test_set_on_link(_Config) ->
  218:     Tester= self(),
  219:     Tracer0 = spawn_link(fun() -> tracer("Tracer0", Tester) end),
  220:     Tracer1 = spawn_link(fun() -> tracer("Tracer1", Tester) end),
  221:     Tracer2 = spawn_link(fun() -> tracer("Tracer2", Tester) end),
  222:     S0 = erlang:trace_session_create([]),
  223:     S1 = erlang:trace_session_create([{tracer,Tracer1}]),
  224:     S2 = erlang:trace_session_create([{tracer,Tracer2}]),
  225: 
  226:     set_on_link(Tracer1, [{session, S1}]),
  227:     set_on_link2(Tracer1, [{session,S1}],
  228:             Tracer2, [{session,S2}]),
  229:     set_on_link2(Tracer0, [{tracer,Tracer0}],
  230:             Tracer2, [{session,S2}]),
  231:     set_on_link2(Tracer2, [{session,S2}],
  232:             Tracer0, [{tracer,Tracer0}]),
  233: 
  234:     set_on_link2(Tracer1, [{session,S1}],
  235:             Tracer0, [{tracer,Tracer0},{session,S0}]),
  236:     set_on_link2(Tracer0, [{tracer,Tracer0},{session,S0}],
  237:             Tracer1, [{session,S1}]),
  238:     ok = erlang:trace_session_destroy(S0),
  239:     ok = erlang:trace_session_destroy(S1),
  240:     ok = erlang:trace_session_destroy(S2),
  241: 
  242:     unlink(Tracer0),
  243:     exit(Tracer0, die),
  244:     unlink(Tracer1),
  245:     exit(Tracer1, die),
  246:     unlink(Tracer2),
  247:     exit(Tracer2, die),
  248:     ok.
  249: test_set_on_first_link(_Config) ->
  250:     Tester= self(),
  251:     Tracer0 = spawn_link(fun() -> tracer("Tracer0", Tester) end),
  252:     Tracer1 = spawn_link(fun() -> tracer("Tracer1", Tester) end),
  253:     Tracer2 = spawn_link(fun() -> tracer("Tracer2", Tester) end),
  254:     S0 = erlang:trace_session_create([]),
  255:     S1 = erlang:trace_session_create([{tracer,Tracer1}]),
  256:     S2 = erlang:trace_session_create([{tracer,Tracer2}]),
  257: 
  258:     set_on_first_link(Tracer1, [{session, S1}]),
  259:     set_on_first_link2(Tracer1, [{session,S1}],
  260:             Tracer2, [{session,S2}]),
  261:     set_on_first_link2(Tracer0, [{tracer,Tracer0}],
  262:             Tracer2, [{session,S2}]),
  263:     set_on_first_link2(Tracer2, [{session,S2}],
  264:             Tracer0, [{tracer,Tracer0}]),
  265: 
  266:     set_on_first_link2(Tracer1, [{session,S1}],
  267:             Tracer0, [{tracer,Tracer0},{session,S0}]),
  268:     set_on_first_link2(Tracer0, [{tracer,Tracer0},{session,S0}],
  269:             Tracer1, [{session,S1}]),
  270:     ok = erlang:trace_session_destroy(S0),
  271:     ok = erlang:trace_session_destroy(S1),
  272:     ok = erlang:trace_session_destroy(S2),
  273: 
  274:     unlink(Tracer0),
  275:     exit(Tracer0, die),
  276:     unlink(Tracer1),
  277:     exit(Tracer1, die),
  278:     unlink(Tracer2),
  279:     exit(Tracer2, die),
  280:     ok.
  281: set_on_spawn(Tracer, Opts) ->
  282:     1 = erlang:trace(self(), true, [procs, set_on_spawn | Opts]),
  283:     Tracee = self(),
  284:     TraceeChild = spawn(fun F() -> receive hej -> Pid = spawn(fun() -> receive M -> M end end), exit(Pid, die), F() end end),
  285:     timer:sleep(100),
  286:     TraceeChild ! hej,
  287:     timer:sleep(100),
  288:     exit(TraceeChild, die),
  289:     timer:sleep(100),
  290:     receive_unsorted(
  291:         [{Tracer,{trace, Tracee, spawn,TraceeChild,'_'}},
  292:          {Tracer,{trace, TraceeChild, spawned,Tracee,'_'}}]),
  293:     receive_unsorted(
  294:         [{Tracer,{trace, TraceeChild, spawn,'_','_'}},
  295:          {Tracer,{trace, '_', spawned,TraceeChild,'_'}},
  296:          {Tracer,{trace, '_', exit, die}},
  297:          {Tracer,{trace, TraceeChild, exit, die}}]),
  298:     1 = erlang:trace(self(), false, [procs, set_on_spawn | Opts]),
  299:     ok.
  300: set_on_spawn2(Tracer1, Opts1, Tracer2, Opts2) ->
  301:     1 = erlang:trace(self(), true, [procs, set_on_spawn | Opts1]),
  302:     1 = erlang:trace(self(), true, [procs, set_on_spawn | Opts2]),
  303:     Tracee = self(),
  304:     TraceeChild = spawn(fun F() -> receive hej -> Pid = spawn(fun() -> receive M -> M end end), exit(Pid, die), F()  end  end),
  305:     timer:sleep(100),
  306:     TraceeChild ! hej,
  307:     timer:sleep(100),
  308:     exit(TraceeChild, die),
  309:     receive_unsorted(
  310:         [{Tracer1,{trace, Tracee, spawn,TraceeChild,'_'}},
  311:          {Tracer2,{trace, Tracee, spawn,TraceeChild,'_'}},
  312:          {Tracer1,{trace, TraceeChild, spawned,Tracee,'_'}},
  313:          {Tracer2,{trace, TraceeChild, spawned,Tracee,'_'}}]),
  314:     receive_unsorted(
  315:         [{Tracer1,{trace, TraceeChild, spawn,'_','_'}},
  316:          {Tracer2,{trace, TraceeChild, spawn,'_','_'}},
  317:          {Tracer1,{trace, '_', spawned,TraceeChild,'_'}},
  318:          {Tracer2,{trace, '_', spawned,TraceeChild,'_'}},
  319:          {Tracer1,{trace, TraceeChild, exit, die}},
  320:          {Tracer2,{trace, TraceeChild, exit, die}},
  321:          {Tracer1,{trace, '_', exit, die}},
  322:          {Tracer2,{trace, '_', exit, die}}]),
  323:     1 = erlang:trace(self(), false, [procs, set_on_spawn | Opts1]),
  324:     TraceeChild1 = spawn(fun F() -> receive hej -> Pid = spawn(fun() -> receive M -> M end end), exit(Pid, die), F()  end  end),
  325:     timer:sleep(100),
  326:     TraceeChild1 ! hej,
  327:     timer:sleep(100),
  328:     exit(TraceeChild1, die),
  329:     timer:sleep(100),
  330:     receive_unsorted(
  331:         [{Tracer2,{trace, Tracee, spawn,TraceeChild1,'_'}},
  332:          {Tracer2,{trace, TraceeChild1, spawned,Tracee,'_'}},
  333:          {Tracer2,{trace, TraceeChild1, spawn,'_','_'}},
  334:          {Tracer2,{trace, '_', spawned,TraceeChild1,'_'}},
  335:          {Tracer2,{trace, TraceeChild1, exit, die}},
  336:          {Tracer2,{trace, '_', exit, die}}]),
  337:     1 = erlang:trace(self(), false, [procs, set_on_spawn | Opts2]),
  338:     ok.
  339: set_on_first_spawn(Tracer, Opts) ->
  340:     1 = erlang:trace(self(), true, [procs, set_on_first_spawn | Opts]),
  341:     Tracee = self(),
  342:     TraceeChild = spawn(fun F() -> receive hej -> Pid = spawn(fun() -> receive M -> M end end), exit(Pid, die), F()  end  end),
  343:     timer:sleep(100),
  344:     TraceeChild ! hej,
  345:     timer:sleep(100),
  346:     exit(TraceeChild, die),
  347:     TraceeChild1 = spawn(fun() -> receive M -> M end end),
  348:     exit(TraceeChild1, die),
  349:     timer:sleep(100),
  350:     receive_unsorted(
  351:         [{Tracer,{trace, Tracee, spawn,TraceeChild,'_'}},
  352:          {Tracer,{trace, TraceeChild, spawned,Tracee,'_'}}]),
  353:     receive_unsorted(
  354:         [{Tracer,{trace, TraceeChild, spawn,'_','_'}},
  355:          {Tracer,{trace, Tracee, spawn,TraceeChild1,'_'}},
  356:          {Tracer,{trace, TraceeChild, exit, die}}]),
  357:     1 = erlang:trace(self(), false, [procs, set_on_first_spawn | Opts]),
  358:     ok.
  359: set_on_first_spawn2(Tracer1, Opts1, Tracer2, Opts2) ->
  360:     1 = erlang:trace(self(), true, [procs, set_on_first_spawn | Opts1]),
  361:     1 = erlang:trace(self(), true, [procs, set_on_first_spawn | Opts2]),
  362:     Tracee = self(),
  363:     TraceeChild = spawn(fun F() -> receive hej -> Pid = spawn(fun() -> receive M -> M end end), exit(Pid, die), F()  end  end),
  364:     timer:sleep(100),
  365:     TraceeChild ! hej,
  366:     timer:sleep(100),
  367:     exit(TraceeChild, die),
  368:     TraceeChild1 = spawn(fun() -> receive M -> M end end),
  369:     timer:sleep(100),
  370:     exit(TraceeChild1, die),
  371:     timer:sleep(100),
  372:     receive_unsorted(
  373:         [{Tracer1,{trace, Tracee, spawn,TraceeChild,'_'}},
  374:          {Tracer2,{trace, Tracee, spawn,TraceeChild,'_'}},
  375:          {Tracer1,{trace, TraceeChild, spawned,Tracee,'_'}},
  376:          {Tracer2,{trace, TraceeChild, spawned,Tracee,'_'}},
  377:          {Tracer1,{trace, TraceeChild, spawn,'_','_'}},
  378:          {Tracer2,{trace, TraceeChild, spawn,'_','_'}}]),
  379:     receive_unsorted(
  380:         [{Tracer1,{trace, Tracee, spawn,TraceeChild1,'_'}},
  381:          {Tracer2,{trace, Tracee, spawn,TraceeChild1,'_'}},
  382:          {Tracer1,{trace, TraceeChild, exit, die}},
  383:          {Tracer2,{trace, TraceeChild, exit, die}}]),
  384:     1 = erlang:trace(self(), false, [procs, set_on_first_spawn | Opts1]),
  385:     TraceeChild2 = spawn(fun F() -> receive hej -> Pid = spawn(fun() -> receive M -> M end end), exit(Pid, die), F()  end  end),
  386:     timer:sleep(100),
  387:     TraceeChild2 ! hej,
  388:     timer:sleep(100),
  389:     exit(TraceeChild2, die),
  390:     timer:sleep(100),
  391:     TraceeChild21 = spawn(fun() -> receive M -> M end end),
  392:     exit(TraceeChild21, die),
  393:     timer:sleep(100),
  394: 
  395:     {Tracer2,{trace, Tracee, spawn,TraceeChild2,_}} = receive_any(),
  396:     {Tracer2,{trace, Tracee, spawn,TraceeChild21,_}} = receive_any(),
  397:     1 = erlang:trace(self(), false, [procs, set_on_first_spawn | Opts2]),
  398:     ok.
  399: set_on_link(Tracer, Opts) ->
  400:     %% Test set_on_link via spawn_link/1
  401:     1 = erlang:trace(self(), true, [procs, set_on_link | Opts]),
  402:     Tracee = self(),
  403:     TraceeChild = spawn_link(fun() -> receive M -> M end end),
  404:     timer:sleep(100),
  405:     unlink(TraceeChild),
  406:     timer:sleep(100),
  407:     exit(TraceeChild, die),
  408:     timer:sleep(100),
  409:     receive_unsorted(
  410:         [{Tracer,{trace, Tracee, spawn,TraceeChild,'_'}},
  411:          {Tracer,{trace, Tracee, link, TraceeChild}},
  412:          {Tracer,{trace, TraceeChild, spawned,Tracee,'_'}},
  413:          {Tracer,{trace, TraceeChild, getting_linked, Tracee}}]),
  414:     receive_unsorted(
  415:         [{Tracer,{trace, Tracee, unlink, TraceeChild}},
  416:          {Tracer,{trace, TraceeChild, getting_unlinked, Tracee}}]),
  417:     {Tracer,{trace, TraceeChild, exit, die}} = receive_any(),
  418:     
  419:     %% Test set_on_link via link/1
  420:     TraceeChild2 = spawn(fun() -> receive M -> M end end),
  421:     timer:sleep(100),
  422:     link(TraceeChild2),
  423:     timer:sleep(100),
  424:     unlink(TraceeChild2),
  425:     timer:sleep(100),
  426:     exit(TraceeChild2, die),
  427:     timer:sleep(100),
  428:     {Tracer,{trace, Tracee, spawn,TraceeChild2,_}} = receive_any(),
  429:     receive_unsorted(
  430:         [{Tracer,{trace, Tracee, link, TraceeChild2}},
  431:          {Tracer,{trace, TraceeChild2, getting_linked, Tracee}}]),
  432:     receive_unsorted(
  433:         [{Tracer,{trace, Tracee, unlink, TraceeChild2}},
  434:          {Tracer,{trace, TraceeChild2, getting_unlinked, Tracee}}]),
  435:     {Tracer,{trace, TraceeChild2, exit, die}} = receive_any(),
  436:     %% Test that you can disable the tracer but still get traces
  437:     %% from child process
  438:     TraceeChild3 = spawn(fun() -> receive M -> M end end),
  439:     timer:sleep(100),
  440:     link(TraceeChild3),
  441:     timer:sleep(100),
  442:     1 = erlang:trace(self(), false, [procs, set_on_link | Opts]),
  443:     unlink(TraceeChild3),
  444:     timer:sleep(100),
  445:     exit(TraceeChild3, die),
  446:     timer:sleep(100),
  447:     receive_unsorted(
  448:         [{Tracer,{trace, Tracee, spawn,TraceeChild3,'_'}},
  449:          {Tracer,{trace, Tracee, link, TraceeChild3}},
  450:          {Tracer,{trace, TraceeChild3, getting_linked, Tracee}}]),
  451:     receive_unsorted(
  452:         [{Tracer,{trace, TraceeChild3, getting_unlinked, Tracee}},
  453:          {Tracer,{trace, TraceeChild3, exit, die}}]),
  454:     %% Test that you can disable the tracer for the child process
  455:     %% and get messages from the parent
  456:     1 = erlang:trace(self(), true, [procs, set_on_link | Opts]),
  457:     TraceeChild4 = spawn(fun() -> receive M -> M end end),
  458:     timer:sleep(100),
  459:     link(TraceeChild4),
  460:     timer:sleep(100),
  461:     1 = erlang:trace(TraceeChild4, false, [procs, set_on_link | Opts]),
  462:     unlink(TraceeChild4),
  463:     timer:sleep(100),
  464:     exit(TraceeChild4, die),
  465:     timer:sleep(100),
  466:     receive_unsorted(
  467:         [{Tracer,{trace, Tracee, spawn,TraceeChild4,'_'}},
  468:          {Tracer,{trace, Tracee, link, TraceeChild4}},
  469:          {Tracer,{trace, TraceeChild4, getting_linked, Tracee}}]),
  470:     receive_unsorted(
  471:         [{Tracer,{trace, Tracee, unlink, TraceeChild4}}]),
  472:     1 = erlang:trace(self(), false, [procs, set_on_link | Opts]),
  473:     spawn_link(fun() -> receive M -> M end end),
  474:     timeout = receive_any(),
  475:     ok.
  476: set_on_link2(Tracer1, Opts1, Tracer2, Opts2) ->
  477:     %% Test multiple tracers with set_on_link via spawn_link/1
  478:     1 = erlang:trace(self(), true, [procs, set_on_link | Opts1]),
  479:     1 = erlang:trace(self(), true, [procs, set_on_link | Opts2]),
  480:     Tracee = self(),
  481:     TraceeChild = spawn_link(fun() -> receive M -> M end end),
  482:     timer:sleep(100),
  483:     unlink(TraceeChild),
  484:     timer:sleep(100),
  485:     exit(TraceeChild, die),
  486:     timer:sleep(100),
  487:     receive_unsorted(
  488:         [{Tracer1,{trace, Tracee, spawn,TraceeChild,'_'}},
  489:          {Tracer2,{trace, Tracee, spawn,TraceeChild,'_'}},
  490:          {Tracer1,{trace, Tracee, link, TraceeChild}},
  491:          {Tracer2,{trace, Tracee, link, TraceeChild}},
  492:          {Tracer1,{trace, TraceeChild, spawned,Tracee,'_'}},
  493:          {Tracer2,{trace, TraceeChild, spawned,Tracee,'_'}},
  494:          {Tracer1,{trace, TraceeChild, getting_linked, Tracee}},
  495:          {Tracer2,{trace, TraceeChild, getting_linked, Tracee}}]),
  496:     receive_unsorted(
  497:         [{Tracer1,{trace, Tracee, unlink, TraceeChild}},
  498:          {Tracer2,{trace, Tracee, unlink, TraceeChild}},
  499:          {Tracer1,{trace, TraceeChild, getting_unlinked, Tracee}},
  500:          {Tracer2,{trace, TraceeChild, getting_unlinked, Tracee}}]),
  501:     receive_unsorted(
  502:         [{Tracer1,{trace, TraceeChild, exit, die}},
  503:          {Tracer2,{trace, TraceeChild, exit, die}}]),
  504:     %% Test multiple tracers with set_on_link via link/1
  505:     TraceeChild1 = spawn(fun() -> receive M -> M end end),
  506:     timer:sleep(100),
  507:     ?line,
  508:     link(TraceeChild1),
  509:     timer:sleep(100),
  510:     unlink(TraceeChild1),
  511:     timer:sleep(100),
  512:     exit(TraceeChild1, die),
  513:     timer:sleep(100),
  514:     receive_unsorted([
  515:         {Tracer1,{trace, Tracee, spawn,TraceeChild1,'_'}},
  516:         {Tracer2,{trace, Tracee, spawn,TraceeChild1,'_'}},
  517:         {Tracer1,{trace, Tracee, link, TraceeChild1}},
  518:         {Tracer2,{trace, Tracee, link, TraceeChild1}},
  519:         {Tracer1,{trace, TraceeChild1, getting_linked, Tracee}},
  520:         {Tracer2,{trace, TraceeChild1, getting_linked, Tracee}}]),
  521:     receive_unsorted(
  522:         [{Tracer1,{trace, Tracee, unlink, TraceeChild1}},
  523:          {Tracer2,{trace, Tracee, unlink, TraceeChild1}},
  524:          {Tracer1,{trace, TraceeChild1, getting_unlinked, Tracee}},
  525:          {Tracer2,{trace, TraceeChild1, getting_unlinked, Tracee}}]),
  526:     receive_unsorted(
  527:         [{Tracer1,{trace, TraceeChild1, exit, die}},
  528:          {Tracer2,{trace, TraceeChild1, exit, die}}]),
  529:     %% Disable one tracer and test that set_on_link still works for the other tracer
  530:     %% via spawn_link/1
  531:     1 = erlang:trace(self(), false, [procs, set_on_link | Opts1]),
  532:     TraceeChild2 = spawn_link(fun() -> receive M -> M end end),
  533:     timer:sleep(100),
  534:     unlink(TraceeChild2),
  535:     timer:sleep(100),
  536:     exit(TraceeChild2, die),
  537:     receive_unsorted(
  538:         [{Tracer2,{trace, Tracee, spawn,TraceeChild2,'_'}},
  539:          {Tracer2,{trace, Tracee, link, TraceeChild2}},
  540:          {Tracer2,{trace, TraceeChild2, spawned,Tracee,'_'}},
  541:          {Tracer2,{trace, TraceeChild2, getting_linked, Tracee}},
  542:          {Tracer2,{trace, Tracee, unlink, TraceeChild2}},
  543:          {Tracer2,{trace, TraceeChild2, getting_unlinked, Tracee}},
  544:          {Tracer2,{trace, TraceeChild2, exit, die}}]),
  545:     %% Test with link/1
  546:     TraceeChild21 = spawn(fun() -> receive M -> M end end),
  547:     timer:sleep(100),
  548:     link(TraceeChild21),
  549:     timer:sleep(100),
  550:     unlink(TraceeChild21),
  551:     timer:sleep(100),
  552:     exit(TraceeChild21, die),
  553:     timer:sleep(100),
  554:     receive_unsorted(
  555:         [{Tracer2,{trace, Tracee, spawn,TraceeChild21,'_'}},
  556:          {Tracer2,{trace, Tracee, link, TraceeChild21}},
  557:          {Tracer2,{trace, TraceeChild21, getting_linked, Tracee}}]),
  558:     receive_unsorted(
  559:         [{Tracer2,{trace, Tracee, unlink, TraceeChild21}},
  560:          {Tracer2,{trace, TraceeChild21, getting_unlinked, Tracee}}]),
  561:     {Tracer2,{trace, TraceeChild21, exit, die}} = receive_any(),
  562:     %% Test that you can disable one of the tracers on the child process
  563:     1 = erlang:trace(self(), true, [procs, set_on_link | Opts1]),
  564:     TraceeChild11 = spawn(fun() -> receive M -> M end end),
  565:     timer:sleep(100),
  566:     link(TraceeChild11),
  567:     timer:sleep(100),
  568:     1 = erlang:trace(TraceeChild11, false, [procs, set_on_link | Opts1]),
  569:     unlink(TraceeChild11),
  570:     timer:sleep(100),
  571:     exit(TraceeChild11, die),
  572:     timer:sleep(100),
  573:     receive_unsorted(
  574:         [{Tracer1,{trace, Tracee, spawn,TraceeChild11,'_'}},
  575:          {Tracer2,{trace, Tracee, spawn,TraceeChild11,'_'}},
  576:          {Tracer1,{trace, Tracee, link, TraceeChild11}},
  577:          {Tracer2,{trace, Tracee, link, TraceeChild11}},
  578:          {Tracer1,{trace, TraceeChild11, getting_linked, Tracee}},
  579:          {Tracer2,{trace, TraceeChild11, getting_linked, Tracee}}]),
  580:     receive_unsorted(
  581:         [{Tracer1,{trace, Tracee, unlink, TraceeChild11}},
  582:          {Tracer2,{trace, Tracee, unlink, TraceeChild11}},
  583:          {Tracer2,{trace, TraceeChild11, getting_unlinked, Tracee}}]),
  584:     receive_unsorted(
  585:         [{Tracer2,{trace, TraceeChild11, exit, die}}]),
  586:     1 = erlang:trace(self(), false, [procs, set_on_link | Opts1]),
  587:     1 = erlang:trace(self(), false, [procs, set_on_link | Opts2]),
  588:     ok.
  589: set_on_first_link(Tracer, Opts) ->
  590:     1 = erlang:trace(self(), true, [procs, set_on_first_link | Opts]),
  591:     Tracee = self(),
  592:     TraceeChild = spawn_link(fun() -> receive M -> M end end),
  593:     timer:sleep(100),
  594:     TraceeChild1 = spawn_link(fun() -> receive M -> M end end),
  595:     timer:sleep(100),
  596:     unlink(TraceeChild),
  597:     timer:sleep(100),
  598:     exit(TraceeChild, die),
  599:     timer:sleep(100),
  600:     unlink(TraceeChild1),
  601:     timer:sleep(100),
  602:     exit(TraceeChild1, die),
  603:     timer:sleep(100),
  604:     receive_unsorted(
  605:         [{Tracer,{trace, Tracee, spawn,TraceeChild,'_'}},
  606:          {Tracer,{trace, Tracee, link, TraceeChild}},
  607:          {Tracer,{trace, TraceeChild, spawned,Tracee,'_'}},
  608:          {Tracer,{trace, TraceeChild, getting_linked, Tracee}}]),
  609:     
  610:     {Tracer,{trace, Tracee, spawn,TraceeChild1,_}} = receive_any(),
  611:     {Tracer,{trace, Tracee, link, TraceeChild1}} = receive_any(),
  612:     receive_unsorted(
  613:         [{Tracer,{trace, Tracee, unlink, TraceeChild}},
  614:          {Tracer,{trace, TraceeChild, getting_unlinked, Tracee}}]),
  615:     {Tracer,{trace, TraceeChild, exit, die}} = receive_any(),
  616:     {Tracer,{trace, Tracee, unlink, TraceeChild1}} = receive_any(),
  617:     %% Test that spawn on first link works with link/1
  618:     1 = erlang:trace(Tracee, true, [set_on_first_link | Opts]),
  619:     TraceeChild2 = spawn(fun() -> receive M -> M end end),
  620:     TraceeChild21 = spawn(fun() -> receive M -> M end end),
  621:     timer:sleep(100),
  622:     link(TraceeChild2),
  623:     link(TraceeChild21),
  624:     timer:sleep(100),
  625:     unlink(TraceeChild2),
  626:     unlink(TraceeChild21),
  627:     timer:sleep(100),
  628:     exit(TraceeChild2, die),
  629:     exit(TraceeChild21,die),
  630:     timer:sleep(100),
  631:     receive_unsorted(
  632:         [{Tracer,{trace, Tracee, spawn,TraceeChild2,'_'}},
  633:          {Tracer,{trace, Tracee, link, TraceeChild2}},
  634:          {Tracer,{trace, Tracee, spawn,TraceeChild21,'_'}},
  635:          {Tracer,{trace, Tracee, link, TraceeChild21}},
  636:          {Tracer,{trace, TraceeChild2, getting_linked, Tracee}}]),
  637:     receive_unsorted(
  638:         [{Tracer,{trace, Tracee, unlink, TraceeChild2}},
  639:          {Tracer,{trace, Tracee, unlink, TraceeChild21}},
  640:          {Tracer,{trace, TraceeChild2, getting_unlinked, Tracee}}]),
  641:     receive_unsorted(
  642:         [{Tracer,{trace, TraceeChild2, exit, die}}]),
  643:     %% Test that spawn on first link flag is not on the child
  644:     1 = erlang:trace(Tracee, true, [set_on_first_link | Opts]),
  645:     TraceeChild3 = spawn(fun F() -> receive hej -> spawn_link(fun()-> receive M -> M end end), F() end end),
  646:     timer:sleep(100),
  647:     link(TraceeChild3),
  648:     timer:sleep(100),
  649:     TraceeChild3 ! hej,
  650:     timer:sleep(100),
  651:     unlink(TraceeChild3),
  652:     timer:sleep(100),
  653:     exit(TraceeChild3, die),
  654:     timer:sleep(100),
  655:     receive_unsorted(
  656:         [{Tracer,{trace, Tracee, spawn,TraceeChild3,'_'}},
  657:          {Tracer,{trace, Tracee, link, TraceeChild3}},
  658:          {Tracer,{trace, TraceeChild3, getting_linked, Tracee}}]),
  659:     receive_unsorted(
  660:         [{Tracer,{trace, TraceeChild3, spawn,'_','_'}},
  661:          {Tracer,{trace, TraceeChild3, link, '_'}}]),
  662:     receive_unsorted(
  663:         [{Tracer,{trace, Tracee, unlink, TraceeChild3}},
  664:          {Tracer,{trace, TraceeChild3, getting_unlinked, Tracee}},
  665:          {Tracer,{trace, TraceeChild3, exit, die}}]),
  666:     1 = erlang:trace(self(), false, [procs, set_on_first_link | Opts]),
  667:     ok.
  668: 
  669: set_on_first_link2(Tracer1, Opts1, Tracer2, Opts2) ->
  670:     1 = erlang:trace(self(), true, [procs, set_on_first_link | Opts1]),
  671:     1 = erlang:trace(self(), true, [procs, set_on_first_link | Opts2]),
  672:     Tracee = self(),
  673:     TraceeChild = spawn_link(fun() -> receive M -> M end end),
  674:     timer:sleep(100),
  675:     TraceeChild1 = spawn_link(fun() -> receive M -> M end end),
  676:     timer:sleep(100),
  677:     unlink(TraceeChild),
  678:     timer:sleep(100),
  679:     exit(TraceeChild, die),
  680:     timer:sleep(100),
  681:     unlink(TraceeChild1),
  682:     timer:sleep(100),
  683:     exit(TraceeChild1, die),
  684:     timer:sleep(100),
  685:     receive_unsorted(
  686:         [{Tracer1,{trace, Tracee, spawn,TraceeChild,'_'}},
  687:          {Tracer2,{trace, Tracee, spawn,TraceeChild,'_'}},
  688:          {Tracer1,{trace, Tracee, link, TraceeChild}},
  689:          {Tracer2,{trace, Tracee, link, TraceeChild}},
  690:          {Tracer1,{trace, TraceeChild, spawned,Tracee,'_'}},
  691:          {Tracer2,{trace, TraceeChild, spawned,Tracee,'_'}},
  692:          {Tracer1,{trace, TraceeChild, getting_linked, Tracee}},
  693:          {Tracer2,{trace, TraceeChild, getting_linked, Tracee}}]),
  694:     receive_unsorted(
  695:         [{Tracer1,{trace, Tracee, spawn,TraceeChild1,'_'}},
  696:          {Tracer2,{trace, Tracee, spawn,TraceeChild1,'_'}},
  697:          {Tracer1,{trace, Tracee, link, TraceeChild1}},
  698:          {Tracer2,{trace, Tracee, link, TraceeChild1}}]),
  699:     receive_unsorted(
  700:         [{Tracer1,{trace, Tracee, unlink, TraceeChild}},
  701:          {Tracer2,{trace, Tracee, unlink, TraceeChild}},
  702:          {Tracer1,{trace, TraceeChild, getting_unlinked, Tracee}},
  703:          {Tracer2,{trace, TraceeChild, getting_unlinked, Tracee}}]),
  704:     receive_unsorted(
  705:         [{Tracer1,{trace, TraceeChild, exit, die}},
  706:          {Tracer2,{trace, TraceeChild, exit, die}}]),
  707:     receive_unsorted(
  708:         [{Tracer1,{trace, Tracee, unlink, TraceeChild1}},
  709:          {Tracer2,{trace, Tracee, unlink, TraceeChild1}}]),
  710: 
  711:     1 = erlang:trace(self(), false, [procs, set_on_first_link | Opts1]),
  712:     TraceeChild2 = spawn_link(fun() -> receive M -> M end end),
  713:     timer:sleep(100),
  714:     TraceeChild21 = spawn_link(fun() -> receive M -> M end end),
  715:     timer:sleep(100),
  716:     unlink(TraceeChild2),
  717:     timer:sleep(100),
  718:     exit(TraceeChild2, die),
  719:     timer:sleep(100),
  720:     unlink(TraceeChild21),
  721:     timer:sleep(100),
  722:     exit(TraceeChild21, die),
  723:     timer:sleep(100),
  724:     {Tracer2,{trace, Tracee, spawn,TraceeChild2,_}} = receive_any(),
  725:     {Tracer2,{trace, Tracee, link, TraceeChild2}} = receive_any(),
  726:     {Tracer2,{trace, Tracee, spawn,TraceeChild21,_}} = receive_any(),
  727:     {Tracer2,{trace, Tracee, link, TraceeChild21}} = receive_any(),
  728:     {Tracer2,{trace, Tracee, unlink, TraceeChild2}} = receive_any(),
  729:     {Tracer2,{trace, Tracee, unlink, TraceeChild21}} = receive_any(),
  730:     1 = erlang:trace(self(), false, [procs, set_on_first_link | Opts2]),
  731:     ok.
  732: procs(_Config) ->
  733:     Tester= self(),
  734:     Tracer0 = spawn_link(fun() -> tracer("Tracer0", Tester) end),
  735:     Tracer1 = spawn_link(fun() -> tracer("Tracer1", Tester) end),
  736:     Tracer2 = spawn_link(fun() -> tracer("Tracer2", Tester) end),
  737: 
  738:     procs_do1(Tracer0, [{tracer, Tracer0}]),
  739: 
  740:     S0 = erlang:trace_session_create([]),
  741:     S1 = erlang:trace_session_create([{tracer,Tracer1}]),
  742:     S2 = erlang:trace_session_create([{tracer,Tracer2}]),
  743: 
  744:     procs_do2(Tracer1, [{session,S1}],
  745:               Tracer2, [{session,S2}]),
  746:     procs_do2(Tracer0, [{tracer,Tracer0}],
  747:               Tracer2, [{session,S2}]),
  748:     procs_do2(Tracer2, [{session,S2}],
  749:               Tracer0, [{tracer,Tracer0}]),
  750: 
  751:     procs_do2(Tracer1, [{session,S1}],
  752:               Tracer0, [{tracer,Tracer0},{session,S0}]),
  753:     procs_do2(Tracer0, [{tracer,Tracer0},{session,S0}],
  754:               Tracer1, [{session,S1}]),
  755: 
  756:     ok = erlang:trace_session_destroy(S0),
  757:     ok = erlang:trace_session_destroy(S1),
  758:     ok = erlang:trace_session_destroy(S2),
  759: 
  760:     unlink(Tracer0),
  761:     exit(Tracer0, die),
  762:     unlink(Tracer1),
  763:     exit(Tracer1, die),
  764:     unlink(Tracer2),
  765:     exit(Tracer2, die),
  766:     ok.
  767: 
  768: procs_do1(Tracer, Opts) ->
  769:     1 = erlang:trace(self(), true, [procs, set_on_spawn | Opts]),
  770: 
  771:     Tracee = self(),
  772:     RegName = ?MODULE,
  773:     register(RegName, Tracee),
  774:     timer:sleep(100),
  775:     unregister(RegName),
  776:     timer:sleep(100),
  777:     TraceeChild = spawn(fun() -> receive M -> M end end),
  778:     timer:sleep(100),
  779:     link(TraceeChild),
  780:     timer:sleep(100),
  781:     unlink(TraceeChild),
  782:     timer:sleep(100),
  783:     exit(TraceeChild, die),
  784:     {Tracer, {trace, Tracee, register, RegName}} = receive_any(),
  785:     {Tracer, {trace, Tracee, unregister, RegName}} = receive_any(),
  786:     receive_unsorted(
  787:       [{Tracer, {trace, Tracee, spawn, TraceeChild, '_'}},
  788:        {Tracer, {trace, TraceeChild, spawned, Tracee, '_'}},
  789:        {Tracer, {trace, Tracee, link, TraceeChild}},
  790:        {Tracer, {trace, TraceeChild, getting_linked, Tracee}}]),
  791:     receive_unsorted(
  792:       [{Tracer, {trace, Tracee, unlink, TraceeChild}},
  793:        {Tracer, {trace, TraceeChild, getting_unlinked, Tracee}}]),
  794:     {Tracer, {trace, TraceeChild, exit, _Reason}} = receive_any(),
  795:     1 = erlang:trace(self(), false, [procs, set_on_spawn | Opts]),
  796: 
  797:     register(RegName, Tracee),
  798:     timer:sleep(100),
  799:     unregister(RegName),
  800:     timer:sleep(100),
  801:     TraceeChild1 = spawn(fun() -> receive M -> M end end),
  802:     timer:sleep(100),
  803:     link(TraceeChild1),
  804:     timer:sleep(100),
  805:     unlink(TraceeChild1),
  806:     timer:sleep(100),
  807:     exit(TraceeChild1, die),
  808: 
  809:     timeout = receive_any(),
  810: 
  811:     ok.
  812: procs_do2(Tracer1, Opts1, Tracer2, Opts2) ->
  813:     1 = erlang:trace(self(), true, [procs, set_on_spawn | Opts1]),
  814:     1 = erlang:trace(self(), true, [procs, set_on_spawn | Opts2]),
  815: 
  816:     Tracee = self(),
  817:     RegName = ?MODULE,
  818:     register(RegName, Tracee),
  819:     timer:sleep(100),
  820:     unregister(RegName),
  821:     timer:sleep(100),
  822:     TraceeChild = spawn(fun() -> receive M -> M end end),
  823:     timer:sleep(100),
  824:     link(TraceeChild),
  825:     timer:sleep(100),
  826:     unlink(TraceeChild),
  827:     timer:sleep(100),
  828:     exit(TraceeChild, die),
  829:     receive_unsorted(
  830:         [{Tracer1, {trace, Tracee, register, RegName}},
  831:          {Tracer2, {trace, Tracee, register, RegName}}]),
  832:     receive_unsorted(
  833:         [{Tracer1, {trace, Tracee, unregister, RegName}},
  834:          {Tracer2, {trace, Tracee, unregister, RegName}}]),
  835:     receive_unsorted(
  836:         [{Tracer1, {trace, Tracee, spawn, TraceeChild, '_'}},
  837:          {Tracer2, {trace, Tracee, spawn, TraceeChild, '_'}},
  838:          {Tracer1, {trace, TraceeChild, spawned, Tracee, '_'}},
  839:          {Tracer2, {trace, TraceeChild, spawned, Tracee, '_'}},
  840:          {Tracer1, {trace, Tracee, link, TraceeChild}},
  841:          {Tracer2, {trace, Tracee, link, TraceeChild}},
  842:          {Tracer1, {trace, TraceeChild, getting_linked, Tracee}},
  843:          {Tracer2, {trace, TraceeChild, getting_linked, Tracee}}]),
  844:     receive_unsorted(
  845:         [{Tracer1, {trace, Tracee, unlink, TraceeChild}},
  846:          {Tracer2, {trace, Tracee, unlink, TraceeChild}},
  847:          {Tracer1, {trace, TraceeChild, getting_unlinked, Tracee}},
  848:          {Tracer2, {trace, TraceeChild, getting_unlinked, Tracee}}]),
  849:     receive_unsorted(
  850:         [{Tracer1, {trace, TraceeChild, exit, '_'}},
  851:          {Tracer2, {trace, TraceeChild, exit, '_'}}]),
  852: 
  853:     1 = erlang:trace(self(), false, [procs, set_on_spawn | Opts1]),
  854:     register(RegName, Tracee),
  855:     timer:sleep(100),
  856:     unregister(RegName),
  857:     timer:sleep(100),
  858:     TraceeChild1 = spawn(fun() -> receive M -> M end end),
  859:     timer:sleep(100),
  860:     link(TraceeChild1),
  861:     timer:sleep(100),
  862:     unlink(TraceeChild1),
  863:     timer:sleep(100),
  864:     exit(TraceeChild1, die),
  865:     {Tracer2, {trace, Tracee, register, RegName}} = receive_any(),
  866:     {Tracer2, {trace, Tracee, unregister, RegName}} = receive_any(),
  867:     receive_unsorted(
  868:         [{Tracer2, {trace, Tracee, spawn, TraceeChild1, '_'}},
  869:          {Tracer2, {trace, TraceeChild1, spawned, Tracee, '_'}},
  870:          {Tracer2, {trace, Tracee, link, TraceeChild1}},
  871:          {Tracer2, {trace, TraceeChild1, getting_linked, Tracee}}]),
  872:     receive_unsorted(
  873:         [{Tracer2, {trace, Tracee, unlink, TraceeChild1}},
  874:          {Tracer2, {trace, TraceeChild1, getting_unlinked, Tracee}}]),
  875:     {Tracer2, {trace, TraceeChild1, exit, _}} = receive_any(),
  876:     1 = erlang:trace(self(), false, [procs, set_on_spawn | Opts2]),
  877:     register(RegName, Tracee),
  878:     timer:sleep(100),
  879:     unregister(RegName),
  880:     timer:sleep(100),
  881:     TraceeChild2 = spawn(fun() -> receive M -> M end end),
  882:     timer:sleep(100),
  883:     link(TraceeChild2),
  884:     timer:sleep(100),
  885:     unlink(TraceeChild2),
  886:     timer:sleep(100),
  887:     exit(TraceeChild2, die),
  888:     timeout = receive_any(),
  889:     ok.
  890: 
  891: basic(_Config) ->
  892:     Tester = self(),
  893:     Tracer0 = spawn_link(fun() -> tracer("Tracer0",Tester) end),
  894:     Tracer1 = spawn_link(fun() -> tracer("Tracer1",Tester) end),
  895:     Tracer2 = spawn_link(fun() -> tracer("Tracer2",Tester) end),
  896: 
  897:     basic_do1(Tracer0, [{tracer, Tracer0}]),
  898: 
  899:     S0 = erlang:trace_session_create([]),
  900:     S1 = erlang:trace_session_create([{tracer,Tracer1}]),
  901:     S2 = erlang:trace_session_create([{tracer,Tracer2}]),
  902: 
  903:     basic_do2(Tracer1, [{session,S1}],
  904:               Tracer2, [{session,S2}]),
  905:     basic_do2(Tracer0, [{tracer,Tracer0}],
  906:               Tracer2, [{session,S2}]),
  907:     basic_do2(Tracer2, [{session,S2}],
  908:               Tracer0, [{tracer,Tracer0}]),
  909: 
  910:     basic_do2(Tracer1, [{session,S1}],
  911:               Tracer0, [{tracer,Tracer0},{session,S0}]),
  912:     basic_do2(Tracer0, [{tracer,Tracer0},{session,S0}],
  913:               Tracer1, [{session,S1}]),
  914: 
  915:     ok = erlang:trace_session_destroy(S0),
  916:     ok = erlang:trace_session_destroy(S1),
  917:     ok = erlang:trace_session_destroy(S2),
  918: 
  919:     unlink(Tracer0),
  920:     exit(Tracer0, die),
  921:     unlink(Tracer1),
  922:     exit(Tracer1, die),
  923:     unlink(Tracer2),
  924:     exit(Tracer2, die),
  925: 
  926:     ok.
  927: 
  928: basic_do1(Tracer, Opts) ->
  929:     1 = erlang:trace(self(), true, [procs | Opts]),
  930: 
  931:     Tracee = self(),
  932:     RegName = ?MODULE,
  933:     register(RegName, Tracee),
  934:     unregister(RegName),
  935: 
  936:     {Tracer, {trace, Tracee, register, RegName}} = receive_any(),
  937:     {Tracer, {trace, Tracee, unregister, RegName}} = receive_any(),
  938: 
  939:     1 = erlang:trace(self(), false, [procs | Opts]),
  940: 
  941:     register(RegName, Tracee),
  942:     unregister(RegName),
  943: 
  944:     timeout = receive_any(),
  945: 
  946:     ok.
  947: 
  948: basic_do2(Tracer1, Opts1, Tracer2, Opts2) ->
  949:     1 = erlang:trace(self(), true, [procs | Opts1]),
  950:     1 = erlang:trace(self(), true, [procs | Opts2]),
  951: 
  952:     Tracee = self(),
  953:     RegName = ?MODULE,
  954:     register(RegName, Tracee),
  955:     unregister(RegName),
  956: 
  957:     receive_unsorted(
  958:       [{Tracer1, {trace, Tracee, register, RegName}},
  959:        {Tracer2, {trace, Tracee, register, RegName}}]),
  960:     receive_unsorted(
  961:       [{Tracer1, {trace, Tracee, unregister, RegName}},
  962:        {Tracer2, {trace, Tracee, unregister, RegName}}]),
  963: 
  964:     1 = erlang:trace(self(), false, [procs | Opts1]),
  965: 
  966:     register(RegName, Tracee),
  967:     unregister(RegName),
  968: 
  969:     {Tracer2, {trace, Tracee, register, RegName}} = receive_any(),
  970:     {Tracer2, {trace, Tracee, unregister, RegName}} = receive_any(),
  971: 
  972:     1 = erlang:trace(self(), false, [procs | Opts2]),
  973: 
  974:     register(RegName, Tracee),
  975:     unregister(RegName),
  976: 
  977:     timeout = receive_any(),
  978: 
  979:     ok.
  980: 
  981: 
  982: call(_Config) ->
  983:     Tester = self(),
  984:     Tracer0 = spawn_link(fun() -> tracer("Tracer0",Tester) end),
  985:     Tracer1 = spawn_link(fun() -> tracer("Tracer1",Tester) end),
  986:     Tracer2 = spawn_link(fun() -> tracer("Tracer2",Tester) end),
  987: 
  988:     call_do1(Tracer0, [{tracer, Tracer0}]),
  989: 
  990:     S0 = erlang:trace_session_create([]),
  991:     S1 = erlang:trace_session_create([{tracer,Tracer1}]),
  992:     S2 = erlang:trace_session_create([{tracer,Tracer2}]),
  993: 
  994:     [begin
  995:          io:format("CallType = ~p\n", [CallType]),
  996:          call_do2(Tracer1, [{session,S1}],
  997:                   Tracer2, [{session,S2}], CallType),
  998:          call_do2(Tracer0, [{tracer,Tracer0}],
  999:                   Tracer2, [{session,S2}], CallType),
 1000:          call_do2(Tracer2, [{session,S2}],
 1001:                   Tracer0, [{tracer,Tracer0}], CallType),
 1002: 
 1003:          call_do2(Tracer1, [{session,S1}],
 1004:                   Tracer0, [{tracer,Tracer0},{session,S0}], CallType),
 1005:          call_do2(Tracer0, [{tracer,Tracer0},{session,S0}],
 1006:                   Tracer1, [{session,S1}], CallType)
 1007:      end
 1008:      || CallType <- [
 1009:                      {[local], fun() -> foo() end},
 1010:                      {[global], fun() -> ?MODULE:foo() end},
 1011:                      {[local], fun() -> ?MODULE:foo() end}]
 1012:     ],
 1013: 
 1014:     ok = erlang:trace_session_destroy(S0),
 1015:     ok = erlang:trace_session_destroy(S1),
 1016:     ok = erlang:trace_session_destroy(S2),
 1017: 
 1018:     unlink(Tracer0),
 1019:     exit(Tracer0, die),
 1020:     unlink(Tracer1),
 1021:     exit(Tracer1, die),
 1022:     unlink(Tracer2),
 1023:     exit(Tracer2, die),
 1024: 
 1025:     ok.
 1026: 
 1027: call_do1(Tracer, Opts) ->
 1028:     MFArity = {?MODULE,foo,0},
 1029:     MFArgs = {?MODULE,foo,[]},
 1030:     Tracee = self(),
 1031:     1 = erlang:trace(Tracee, true, [call | Opts]),
 1032:     1 = erlang:trace_pattern(MFArity, true, add_session([local], Opts)),
 1033: 
 1034:     foo(),
 1035: 
 1036:     {Tracer, {trace, Tracee, call, MFArgs}} = receive_any(),
 1037: 
 1038:     1 = erlang:trace(self(), false, [call | Opts]),
 1039: 
 1040:     foo(),
 1041:     timeout = receive_any(),
 1042: 
 1043:     ok.
 1044: 
 1045: call_do2(Tracer1, Opts1, Tracer2, Opts2, {TPopt, Call}) ->
 1046:     MFArity = {?MODULE,foo,0},
 1047:     MFArgs = {?MODULE,foo,[]},
 1048:     Tracee = self(),
 1049:     1 = erlang:trace(Tracee, true, [call | Opts1]),
 1050:     1 = erlang:trace(Tracee, true, [call | Opts2]),
 1051: 
 1052:     ?line,
 1053:     1 = erlang:trace_pattern(MFArity, true, add_session(TPopt, Opts1)),
 1054:     Call(),
 1055:     {Tracer1, {trace, Tracee, call, MFArgs}} = receive_any(),
 1056:     timeout = receive_any(),
 1057: 
 1058:     ?line,
 1059:     1 = erlang:trace_pattern(MFArity, true, add_session(TPopt, Opts2)),
 1060:     Call(),
 1061:     {Ta, {trace, Tracee, call, MFArgs}} = receive_any(),
 1062:     {Tb, {trace, Tracee, call, MFArgs}} = receive_any(),
 1063:     timeout = receive_any(),
 1064:     #{Tracer1 := v, Tracer2 := v} = #{Ta => v, Tb => v},
 1065: 
 1066: 
 1067:     ?line,
 1068:     1 = erlang:trace_pattern(MFArity, false, add_session(TPopt, Opts2)),
 1069:     Call(),
 1070:     {Tracer1, {trace, Tracee, call, MFArgs}} = receive_any(),
 1071:     timeout = receive_any(),
 1072: 
 1073:     ?line,
 1074:     1 = erlang:trace_pattern(MFArity, true, add_session(TPopt, Opts2)),
 1075:     Call(),
 1076:     {Tc, {trace, Tracee, call, MFArgs}} = receive_any(),
 1077:     {Td, {trace, Tracee, call, MFArgs}} = receive_any(),
 1078:     timeout = receive_any(),
 1079:     #{Tracer1 := v, Tracer2 := v} = #{Tc => v, Td => v},
 1080: 
 1081:     ?line,
 1082:     1 = erlang:trace_pattern(MFArity, false, add_session(TPopt, Opts1)),
 1083:     Call(),
 1084:     {Tracer2, {trace, Tracee, call, MFArgs}} = receive_any(),
 1085:     timeout = receive_any(),
 1086: 
 1087:     ?line,
 1088:     1 = erlang:trace_pattern(MFArity, true, add_session(TPopt, Opts1)),
 1089:     Call(),
 1090:     {Te, {trace, Tracee, call, MFArgs}} = receive_any(),
 1091:     {Tf, {trace, Tracee, call, MFArgs}} = receive_any(),
 1092:     timeout = receive_any(),
 1093:     #{Tracer1 := v, Tracer2 := v} = #{Te => v, Tf => v},
 1094: 
 1095:     ?line,
 1096:     1 = erlang:trace(self(), false, [call | Opts1]),
 1097:     Call(),
 1098:     {Tracer2, {trace, Tracee, call, MFArgs}} = receive_any(),
 1099:     timeout = receive_any(),
 1100: 
 1101:     ?line,
 1102:     1 = erlang:trace_pattern(MFArity, false, add_session(TPopt, Opts2)),
 1103:     Call(),
 1104:     timeout = receive_any(),
 1105: 
 1106:     ?line,
 1107:     1 = erlang:trace_pattern(MFArity, false, add_session(TPopt, Opts1)),
 1108:     1 = erlang:trace(self(), false, [call | Opts2]),
 1109:     Call(),
 1110:     timeout = receive_any(),
 1111: 
 1112:     ok.
 1113: 
 1114: meta(_Config) ->
 1115:     Tester = self(),
 1116:     Tracer0 = spawn_link(fun() -> tracer("Tracer0",Tester) end),
 1117: 
 1118:     MFArity = {?MODULE,foo,0},
 1119:     MFArgs = {?MODULE,foo,[]},
 1120:     1 = erlang:trace_pattern(MFArity,true,[{meta,Tracer0}]),
 1121: 
 1122:     ?line,
 1123:     foo(),
 1124:     {Tracer0, {trace_ts,P,call,MFArgs,{_,_,_}}} = receive_any(),
 1125: 
 1126:     ?line,
 1127:     ?MODULE:foo(),
 1128:     {Tracer0, {trace_ts,P,call,MFArgs,{_,_,_}}} = receive_any(),
 1129: 
 1130:     1 = erlang:trace_pattern(MFArity,false,[meta]),
 1131: 
 1132:     ?line,
 1133:     foo(),
 1134:     timeout = receive_any(),
 1135: 
 1136:     unlink(Tracer0),
 1137:     exit(Tracer0, die),
 1138: 
 1139:     ok.
 1140: 
 1141: foo() ->
 1142:     ok.
 1143: 
 1144: add_session(DstOpts, SrcOpts) ->
 1145:     case lists:keyfind(session, 1, SrcOpts) of
 1146:         {session, _}=S ->
 1147:             [S | DstOpts];
 1148:         false ->
 1149:             DstOpts
 1150:     end.
 1151: 
 1152: tracer(Name, Tester) ->
 1153:     receive M ->
 1154:             io:format("~p ~p got message: ~p\n", [Name, self(), M]),
 1155:             Tester ! {self(), M}
 1156:     end,
 1157:     tracer(Name, Tester).
 1158: 
 1159: 
 1160: receive_any() ->
 1161:     receive_any(100).
 1162: 
 1163: receive_any(Timeout) ->
 1164:     receive M -> M
 1165:     after Timeout -> timeout
 1166:     end.
 1167: 
 1168: receive_unsorted(Expect) ->
 1169:     receive_unsorted(Expect, length(Expect)).
 1170: 
 1171: receive_unsorted(Expect0, Cnt) when Cnt > 0 ->
 1172:     M = receive_any(),
 1173:     Expect1 = match_and_delete(M, Expect0, []),
 1174:     receive_unsorted(Expect1, Cnt-1);
 1175: receive_unsorted(_, 0) ->
 1176:     ok.
 1177: 
 1178: match_and_delete(M, [Pattern | Tail], Failed) ->
 1179:     case match(Pattern, M) of
 1180:         true -> Failed ++ Tail;
 1181:         false ->
 1182:             match_and_delete(M, Tail, [Pattern | Failed])
 1183:     end;
 1184: match_and_delete(M, [], Failed) ->
 1185:     io:format("Expected any of:\n~p\n", [Failed]),
 1186:     io:format("Got message:\n~p\n", [M]),
 1187:     ct:fail("Unexpected messages: ~p", [M]).
 1188: 
 1189: 
 1190: 
 1191: match(A, A) -> true;
 1192: match('_', _) -> true;
 1193: match([Ah|At], [Bh|Bt]) ->
 1194:     match(Ah, Bh) andalso match(At, Bt);
 1195: match(A, B) when tuple_size(A) =:= tuple_size(B) ->
 1196:     match(tuple_to_list(A), tuple_to_list(B));
 1197: match(_A, _B) ->
 1198:     false.
 1199: 
 1200: 
 1201: end_of_list(_Config) ->
 1202:     ok.
